error.message: Call to deprecated function node_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\Entity\Node::load().
Calls to function dsm should not exist.
Calls to function dsm should not exist.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to access_by_ref.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
